q1.question: Can I change my subscription plan anytime?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your subscription plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

q2.question: What happens if I exceed my monthly ride limit?
q2.answer: If you exceed your plan's ride limit, additional rides will be charged at our standard pay-per-ride rates. We'll notify you when you're close to your limit.

q3.question: Do you offer refunds?
q3.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for new subscribers. For individual rides, refunds are processed case-by-case based on our refund policy.

q4.question: Are there any hidden fees?
q4.answer: No hidden fees! All prices shown include taxes. The only additional charges might be for special requests like extra stops or waiting time beyond the included limit.
